name: Slither - A Snake Adventure (Addictive 247 Games)
description:
Trapped in the randomly generated rooms eat apples to make your snake grow and collect the keys to unlock the doors. Move from room to room where no two games will be the same.

Take your snake through dungeons, mazes, gardens and even a graveyard. Destroy the flowers but look out for the spiders!

Try and escape (yes, there is an ending!) and get your snake to freedom in the fastest time.
